title: Ridiculous Matchmaking
body:
I've seen someone else post about this and I've just experienced it myself. Riot needs to stop putting players with massive skill differences in the same games. I've had multiple games where there are challenger players in one team and unranked ones in the other, the latter playing like they're relatively new to the game. Yes they were normal games, but I don't find them enjoyable in any way.

"Speeding up queue" argument seems counter-intuitive. I'd rather wait for a 5 - 15 minute queue than waste 30 minutes in a horrible game where one side feels bored and the other hopeless.
